  • masjid cleanup and social

    Monday, April 11th

     THE WALLS ARE UP! JOIN US SATURDAY FOR A CLEAN-UP SOCIAL

    The Berkeley Masjid construction is approaching completion by Ramadan 2011. Only a few items left to open. Next up: paint and light fixtures

     

    JOIN US THIS SATURDAY:

    3:30 - 5:00 pm we will be holding a community get-together at the masjid to clean it up.

    Bring comfortable, well worn clothes. They may get trashed!

  • In the spirit of ramadan

    Berkeley Masjid needs your help! Please come out to our fundraiser August 1st! Even if you can't, PLEDGE your donation BEFORE August 1st!


    Facebook Event: http://www.facebook.com/event.php?eid=117560311622261&ref=ts

    Come out insh'Allah, and let's see this Masjid finished!

  • 20-for-20 campaign

     

    Thank you all for supporting the Berkeley Masjid through the 20-for-20 campaign.

     

    We raised $26,978 in one month, bringing us one step closer to completion insha'Allah. We thank you and encourage you all to continue your support. It is only through your generosity that this vision can become a reality.

     

    Please be sure to check the Construction news for monthly updates on progress.

  • from the minbar to the wall

    As-Salaamu Alaykum
    May Peace Be Upon You 

    From the Minbar to the Wall - Help us Complete the Berkeley Masjid 

    WATCH THE BERKELEY MASJID VIDEO!

    Thank you all for supporting the Berkeley Masjid. We raised $114,000 since last October. We are still $316,00 short of completion, and are pushing to finish. Our drop-dead deadline is March 2011, since the City of Berkeley will not extend our building permit any further than that. Please be sure to check the Construction news for monthly updates on progress.

     

    Featured Update:

    MAY 22, 2010 - Masjid front doors installed and they look gorgeous - photos soon!
